virtual void sxsdk::polygon_mesh_class::append_face ( int  n_v,
const int  v[],
void *  aux = 0 
) [virtual]

Appends a new face to the polygon mesh.

It is also possible to create a face without connecting vertices in more than 5 places. However, if all the points are not in the same flat plane the display result is not guaranteed.

Parameters:
v the list of vertex numbers

virtual void sxsdk::polygon_mesh_class::make_edges ( void *  aux = 0  )  [virtual]

Generates necessary edges for the polygon mesh object.

Because Shade stores edge and face info separately, sometimes a face is generated that does not have edges. This function detects those faces and generates edges for them.

virtual void sxsdk::polygon_mesh_class::subdivide ( int  level,
void *  aux = 0 
) [virtual]

Does round subdivision of polygon meshes.

When subdivision is done, computes and internally stores the vertex, face, and edge info subdivided with round.

The stored vertex, face, and edge info can be returned by normal methods (replaces the info from before round was applied)

Only stores the info; the object itself is not modified.

After getting the info, cancel the subdivision with unsubdivide().

Parameters:
level Subdivision level. 0: no subdivision (or minimum subdivision), 1: coarse, 2: regular, 3: fine...
virtual void sxsdk::polygon_mesh_class::unsubdivide ( void *  aux = 0  )  [virtual]

Cancels the subdivision.

Releases the info stored by subdivide().
